attributes.action: Give Bob Geldof's Knighthood to Nigel Farage (MEP)
attributes.background: Bob Geldof's poverty relief projects were well meaning but failed. His protest on the Thames lately were rather demeaning to the working class. On the other hand, Nigel Farage helped secure Britain a much-needed referendum on Britain's membership of the EU, which was won. Let's give it to him.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people to be honoured or for honours to be taken away. You can find out more about honours here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
